c74object.name: abc.mc.busplus~
c74object.digest: Abclib's crossfaded selector of two buses
c74object.description:
abc.mc.busplus~ enable to implement multichannel bus selections (from 1 signal to 15 signals). Two buses are connected to the object, the left one and the right one.
- the leftOrRight parameter enables to select between the left or the right bus.
- the ramp parameter enables to set a crossfade duration when switching between the two buses

objarg.name: signalsPerBus
objarg.description: sets the number of signals of each bus [init=1:min=1:max=16]

attribute.name: ramp
attribute.description: sets the transition ramp duration in milliseconds [init=100:min=0:max=100000:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the transition duration in msec

attribute.name: leftOrRight
attribute.description: sets the index of the bus to select, 0 for left, 1 for right [init=0:min=0:max=1:step=1].
attribute.digest: sets the index of the bus to select

method.name: ramp
method.description: sets the transition ramp duration in milliseconds [init=100:min=0:max=100000:step=1].
method.digest: sets the transition duration in msec

method.name: leftOrRight
method.description: sets the index of the bus to select, 0 for left, 1 for right [init=0:min=0:max=1:step=1].
method.digest: sets the index of the bus to select
